description: Daniel is a Content Marketing Manager at Similarweb who loves data, running, and travel. He holds an MBA and a BA in Philosophy and lives in Tel Aviv.
content: HomeBlogDaniel Schneider Director, Content Marketing Daniel Schneider Daniel is the Director of Content Marketing at Similarweb. With an extensive background in digital marketing and communications, he has previously worked as a copywriter and project manager across the ecommerce, fintech, and governmental sectors. Since joining Similarweb in 2019, Daniel has crafted content on a wide range of topics, including audience intelligence, market research, marketing strategies, consumer behaviors, and retail trends. He earned his Bachelor's Degree from Tel Aviv University and an MBA from Tel Aviv Academic College. Daniel lives in Tel Aviv, Israel, with his family, where he enjoys reading and running.
